contexts.context: When the <mark>sun</mark> set, Lledos, Galsiah, and Imalyn approached...
As he prodded his mount forward and the <mark>sun</mark> began rising, Sathis pictured Galsiah and Imalyn not...
The <mark>sun</mark> was fully risen when Sathis reached the stables of...
...Within the Ghostfence, rain never falls and the <mark>sun</mark> never shines; the only weather is the red...
